author: scottbw
msg: Updated JQuery Mobile feature to use release 1.0b1 as per WOOKIE-220. Note that as JQM no longer generates "back" buttons this meant updating a few widgets to create appropriate "home" links. We no longer need to create a special patched version as back/forward buttons are no longer generated by JQM - however it is no up to widget developers to put in appropriate navigation links. Note also this version claims support for IE 7-9, which also fixes WOOKIE-183.

author: rickhall
msg: Create hash set on demand for fragment caps. (FELIX-2950)

author: sergey
msg: very small additional speed improvement (less garbage)
